item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description:
Education

  • Vocational training as psychological psychotherapist in Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, 01/2016 – present, CIP Training Institute for Behavioral Therapy, Erlangen, Germany

  • Postgraduate studies, 06/2014 – present, Addressing Challenges in Internet Interventions for Mental Disorders: Studies on Age-Specific Efficacy, Adherence, and Undertreated Disorders, Friedrich-Alexander-Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg, Erlangen, Germany & Leuphana Universität Lüneburg, Lüneburg, Germany

  • University diploma in Psychology, 10/2008 – 09/2013, Philipps-Universität Marburg, Marburg, Germany

  • A-levels, 09/1999 – 06/2008, Humboldtgymnasium, Bad Homburg, Germany

\(~\)

Lecturing

\(~\)

Seminar on Addictive Disorders

Friedrich-Alexander-Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg, Erlangen, Germany

\(~\)

Seminar on Clinical Diagnostics in Practice I

Friedrich-Alexander-Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg, Erlangen, Germany

\(~\)

Tutor for Study Progress Monitoring

Leuphana Universität Lüneburg, Lüneburg, Germany

\(~\)

Research

Visiting researcher

01/2017 – 03/2017

Under supervision of Prof. Dr. Sally Merry on Serious Gaming in internet interventions

The University of Auckland, Department of Psychological Medicine, Auckland, New Zealand

\(~\)

Research associate

09/2015 – present

EU project Integrating Technology into Mental Health Care Delivery in Europe (ICare, Horizon2020): Development and evaluation of a transdiagnostic internet-based prevention program for anxiety and depression

Department of Clinical Psychology and Psychotherapy, Friedrich-Alexander-Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg, Erlangen, Germany

\(~\)

EU project Innovation Incubator Health Trainings Online (GET.ON)

01/2014 – 07/2015

Design and evaluation of two randomized controlled trials to evaluate an internet-based stress management intervention

Leuphana Universität Lüneburg, Lüneburg, Germany

\(~\)

Research assistant

10/2011 – 10/2013

Project by the Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) on online-based aftercare of inpatient depression treatment

Department of Clinical Psychology and Psychotherapy

Philipps-Universität Marburg, Marburg, Germany

\(~\)

Hospital Nürnberg Nord, psychiatric treatment center for drug and alcohol addicts [Klinikum Nürnberg Nord], Nuremberg, Germany
